Reviews.Title: Magnavox brand
Reviews.Author: the contented cat
Reviews.Content: The screen on this set is very bright.  It was a bit challenging trying to adjust the brightness.  The picture quality is very nice.  You will get the full 22 inches on some programs and about 19 inches on others.  I am using my set with a hdtv aerial.  I get as many as 53 channels with the aerial alone.  I do not have cable.  I purchased a Phillips aerial for this set, but it would not properly go into the cable fitting.  So I am using a Radio Shack antenna instead.  The set is lightweight.  The stand is lightweight.  I would not recommend it for wall mounting.  I admire the Magnavox name and I am happy with this purchase.

ProductInfo.Features:
Supports 1080i,720P,480i,480p
Side PC Input,2 HDMI inputs
1366x 768 WXGA res
Sleep Timer, auto shut off
5 band EQ and ECO
ProductInfo.Name: Magnavox 22MF330B/F7 22-Inch 720p LCD HDTV, Black
